Reviews.Title: Works . . . until it breaks
Reviews.Author: W. Gallagher
Reviews.Content: I would stay away from this phone from any supplier. My wife and I have had four in the past four years (original buys from Verizon, warranty replacements, separate used purchase), and every one has been rendered useless when the right hinge broke. Even the people at my local Verizon store have admitted that it is a basic design error - even they wouldn't do anything about it once outside of the warranty.

Reviews.Title: Great buy!
Reviews.Author: jspain1986
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone because my LG got water damage...it arrived quickly and has been a great little phone to use!  I like the flip phone feature, and it actually has pretty good pictures/ camera quality for a phone of its type.  Very easy user interface and has all the tools and features I needed!  Would definitely recommend this phone and the seller.

Reviews.Title: What the phone is, and how 3 turned out: 4 years owning it
Reviews.Author: Tim the enchanter
Reviews.Content: I used this phone for 2 and a half years before I upgraded and decided to keep this one as a backup. It worked great all throughout the time of its usage. It then went into storage for about a year and a half, never used. My girlfriend then broke her phone so I gave her this one to use and she loves it now too. Not in the "its got all sorts of awesome features and can do so much cool stuff!" kind of way, but in the "its reliable, and of good quality in what a phone NEEDS to do" sort of way.There is not much to tell about this phone. It does everything basic that you need. Whether it be texting, calling, or simply writing down a note real quick that you need to remember, or a calendar reminder, its got you covered. Its also got an alarm so you can use this instead of an actual alarm clock. It has picture and video capabilities as well. However understand this is an old phone and only has a 1 megapixel camera... In other words the quality isn't that great. Especially for videos, they look pretty poorly. Picture are decent though.The only way this phone stands out is the three buttons on the front.. If you take a close look those buttons are skip, back, and play/pause for music. So if you need a music player this phone works great for it. Its also got good speakers on it (compared to other phones) its also louder than regular phones, should you need it. However unlike newer phones this phone does not have a headphone jack. To hear its music you must use its speakers built into it. There is a small jack on the side that LOOKS like a headphone jack but a lot smaller, not sure what its for so it may be possible to get an adapter to use headphones.All in all I've loved this phone. I would give it 5 stars on my own personal experience, however my mom and little sister also got this phone so I must give justice to the overall quality of this phone. My mom, little sister and me all got this phone at the same time. Within one week my little sister had dropped and  broken hers, and to replace it it was "policy" for Verizon to force give us insurance which added 5$ a month to it, which made me pretty mad at them since it was only a week old. She didn't have problems after that until the end of her contract when her battery had died and could only last a few hours. My moms was good like mine, lasted the whole 2 years, however her battery also died quickly as well. Only mine lasts there, and that is because I use a recharging technique to keep batteries lasting long.By the way, this technique is to FULLY charge the battery, then use it until it FULLY dies, then fully charge again, and repeat, this maximizes battery life. While my moms and little sisters phones only lasts a day on a full charge, mine lasts a week. It lasted about 2 weeks when brand new. This is probably  good for all phones. Naturally you cannot ALWAYS do this but if you can manage it most of the time it could make the difference between a week or a day of battery life when the phone turns 2 years old. In this phones case at least that did make a huge difference, however in my new phone that is not the case. Again, my little sis and mom's new phones only last a day, but mine lasts about 3, it depends on the model how well this works.My little sister broke it immediately when it fell off her lap, out of the car, and onto the pavement, breaking the screen. If you are not an accident-prone person, and don't want something fancy, but just a good, reliable, simple, phone. I highly recommend this one. My mom and little sister still have theirs as backups should they need it. However its simplicity and lack of uses would make anyone who wants a fancy phone bored in about a day. You could probably spend about an hour to 2 hours testing everything it can do and then you can already be done with EVERYTHING it is capable of.Also, when I got the phone Verizon gave it 1 month free V-cast and internet. Both are very slow and not very usable. Not a phone for data, avoid this phone if you want internet because its not up to the job. Talk, text, music is what it does best. It does these well, and reliably. However it lacks all the innovations of the last 4 years and for most it can be considered an "outdated" phone. Because of that, I dock it another star to total 3 stars. Odds are it will disappoint if you want new technology. For me personally, who just wants a phone to be used for talk, text, a watch, and alarm clock, it does great. 5 stars for me, but gets 3 stars after all aspects are considered.

Reviews.Title: Great Transaction
Reviews.Author: mandy09
Reviews.Content: The transaction went smoothly and we got our product 4 days after we purchased it. The product was in great condition and works fantastic. Easy to use and simple for someone that doesn't like difficult products. Thanks so much.

Reviews.Title: Classic Great Phone
Reviews.Author: prodeznr
Reviews.Content: After 3 years hinge on old unit failed. Verizon said it lasted an unusually long time. Guess I'm careful. Got another because I wanted just a great phone with exceptional speakerphone function. Too bad good designs can't be preserved and evolved into better and better classic reliable products. Contented with simplicity and familiarity.

Reviews.Title: Unit functional, but weird
Reviews.Author: DavidBrawn
Reviews.Content: This is, for me, a temporary replacement for a damaged phone, until the iPhone5 comes out in late summer.  The unit I received is fully functional, but seems to power itself off at least daily, which is irritating.  I have changed the battery to the one from the older phone and this doesn not seem to matter.  I just hope this is the only thing to go awry with this phone in the 6 months I intend it to serve me!!

Reviews.Title: Looked good
Reviews.Author: 20kcounting
Reviews.Content: Did not work out of the box, No contact info on the invoices, this phone now takes up space in a drawer somewhere.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Richard Wineberg
Reviews.Content: This is the third one I have owned,  'twas elated to find phone "like new" after ordering "used".  Very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: short battery life.
Reviews.Author: Ken Johns
Reviews.Content: When charging the "charge complete" never displays. Battery life is less than one day and it drops fast when not in use. Have to turn off to stop the drain. I have tried 3 batteries, the one sent with it, the one from another phone and a new one. They all do the same.

Reviews.Title: very disappointed
Reviews.Author: pam porter
Reviews.Content: the charger was broken, did not realize how small the numbers were and does not work for me. thank you

Reviews.Title: A good, simple, reliable phone.
Reviews.Author: Dorcus "Dorcus"
Reviews.Content: This is a good simple and affordable phone.  My husband had it when it first came out, and it served us well.  I only needed a pay as you go plan and was so happy to be able to order it again.  Very happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Good Phone
Reviews.Author: J. Cole
Reviews.Content: Good replacement phone for my mom's phone (same one) that broke. Worked out perfectly so she did not have to learn how to use another one.

Reviews.Title: LG VX-8350 Cell Phone
Reviews.Author: Lisa M. Coate
Reviews.Content: I got this phone for my son, and he is quite happy with it.  We got a great price on it, and it is in very good condition. The phone was shipped pretty fast too!

Reviews.Title: Broke again...
Reviews.Author: Scoop
Reviews.Content: I'm on my third (and last) LG VX-8350.Hinge broke for the third time. I'm notrough with phones, but I do open it with one hand.Cheap plastic hinge breaks!

Reviews.Title: Unconvincing Quality Service
Reviews.Author: Signature
Reviews.Content: Phone was supposed to be refurbished, but upon receiving it, I noticed that it was not in very good shape and the camera does not work.

Reviews.Title: i like it!
Reviews.Author: Denise Smith
Reviews.Content: this specific phone is very reliable, affordable, and easy to use. it is a good size as well, not too big-not too small.

Reviews.Title: I didn't like the speakers in the back
Reviews.Author: Edward Paolo
Reviews.Content: I didn't like that the speakers were placed in the back.I later purchased on Ebay 8360 which have them in the front.Maybe it really isn't that big of a deal after all.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Substitute
Reviews.Author: Duffsgal
Reviews.Content: In contrast to having to pay $250 for a new phone to replace one that went through the washing machine, this inexpensive phone worked out wonderfully.  The seller provided all the necessary parts and it works fine.  The seller deserves an A+ rating.

Reviews.Title: It is a good phone
Reviews.Author: RICHARD MASSA
Reviews.Content: I just think that it could have been cleaned at least before sending it. Other than that, it works good!

Reviews.Title: Phone charger broke
Reviews.Author: Helen
Reviews.Content: I purchased 2 of these phones because Verizon had nothing inexpensive to hold me over for a month until my upgrade. The 1 phone was fine but the other one's charger broke as soon as I tried to put it in the phone.

Reviews.Title: Nice size and good reception
Reviews.Author: wanda
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice phone for someone who does not text as the person who has it does not.......just feels good in your hand and I like it a lot.

Reviews.Title: This phone only lasted about four months
Reviews.Author: r.w.
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone about four months ago and the problem with the phone isThat when I talk the person can't hear me also the "ok" button on phone stop working.If that's not enough LG does not want to accept their 1 year warranty because they stop selling this item already.

Reviews.Title: I Really Liked This Phone - but,
Reviews.Author: Loyd E. Eskildson "Pragmatist"
Reviews.Content: Simple to use, good price. Then it broke - the right-side hinge attaching the two clamshell portions together. Someone else wrote a similar note. DO NOT BUY!

Reviews.Title: Phone defective
Reviews.Author: C. Kinney
Reviews.Content: I'm in the process of returning this phone to the seller as it was defective from the get go.  The seller didn't send me a pre-paid return label so I had to pay shipping but he has told me he will refund that.Also, regarding the phone itself.  The hinge will break.  We've gone through a few of these and will likely abandon it soon.  Beware of this issue as another reviewer stated it is a design flaw.

Reviews.Title: Great Customer Service
Reviews.Author: J. linhardt
Reviews.Content: My husband uses a plain phone....He really likes this phone but we REALLY like this company......The phone did not work right when we got it and we called and within the hour we received a call from the company (SUNDAY) and they replaced it.........Great to have someone call you right away......

Reviews.Title: LG phone
Reviews.Author: Tim
Reviews.Content: I received the phone in a timely manner. However, the phone was listed as being in good condition. There were scratches on the front and inside displays. I feel this should have been mentioned or the phone should have been listed as being in fair condition. Also, the previous owner's personal information ie: contacts, photos, persoanl notes, etc., had not been deleted. This is my first time buying a used phone thru an Amazon dealer. I am less than pleased.

Reviews.Title: LG VX-8350
Reviews.Author: Shavonna Baxley
Reviews.Content: The phone itself works, but it can not be switched over to the verizon service in my area. Verizon tried for 2 days without success.

ProductInfo.Features:
This product has been carefully audited and is certified to be 100% functional.
This offer includes the following accessories 1. Battery 2. Battery Cover (if applicable) 3. Wall Charger
ProductInfo.Name: LG VX-8350 Dark Gray Cell Phone for Verizon Wireless Contract Free
